page.title: 08The Cotswold Hunt 2
page.content: SS The puppies do not start hunting until the September after their first Christmas on the farms.When they come back they put them on "couples"with older hounds.The couple is a two piece of leather with a chain between.This is to give the puppies education. Out hunting the Master wears a red jacket,white breeches and black riding boots.Children out hunting wear a Tweed jacket,white breeches and black riding boots. They start cub hunting as soon as the corn is cut.They sometimes hunt on foot when the ground is too hard with frost or covered with snow.
